name: Remove Tumblr Username Popup
description:
Annoyed by that popup that shows up while hovering over usernames? Then be annoyed no more, a simple fix to make it disappear.

Done by request.

user.name: Jitaroo
user.about: Hi, I'm Jitaroo, I write codes for various sites out of personal interest. Not a serious coder when it comes to these styles but I hope you like anything I happen to produce. :3 Donations are greatly appreciated.

additional_info: DISADVANTAGES This will unfortunately remove the Notes pop-up as well, I haven't found the Class or ID to specifically target username box. However I feel like switching the style off here and there to look at the notes is far less tedious than keeping the pop up. Will update if I find username specific selectors.
